title: Smart Data Models - CatalogueDCAT-AP
description: Catalogue of datasets compliant with DCAT-AP specification version 2.1.1.

type.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. It has to be Catalogue

description.description: Property. Model:'http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#Literal'. This property contains a free-text account of the Catalogue. This property can be repeated for parallel language versions of the description. For further information on multilingual issues, please refer to section 8 of the pdf document https://codeload.github.com/SEMICeu/DCAT-AP/zip/refs/tags/v2.1.1

items.description: Property. Catalogue description in different languages

publisher.description: Property. Model:'http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/#term_Agent'. This property refers to an entity (organisation) responsible for making the Catalogue available

title.description: Property. Model:'http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#Literal'. This property contains a name given to the Catalogue. This property can be repeated for parallel language versions of the name

dataset.description: Relationship. Model:'http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#dataset'. This property links the Catalogue with a Dataset that is part of the Catalogue

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

service.description: Relationship. Model:'http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#DataService'. This property refers to a site or end-point (Data Service) that is listed in the Catalogue. As empty Catalogues are usually indications of problems, this property should be combined with the previous property dataset to implement an empty Catalogue check

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

items.description: Property. NGSI-LD id of the different services linked to the catalogue

homepage.description: Property. Model:'http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/homepage'. This property refers to a web page that acts as the main page for the Catalogue

language.description: Property. Model:'http://purl.org/dc/terms/LinguisticSystem'. This property refers to a language used in the textual metadata describing titles, descriptions, etc. of the Datasets in the Catalogue. This property can be repeated if the  metadata is provided in multiple languages

items.description: Property. Individual identifiers of the language

license.description: Property. Model:'http://purl.org/dc/terms/LicenseDocument'. This property refers to the licence under which the Catalogue can be used or reused

issued.description: Property. Model:'http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#Literal'. This property contains the date of formal issuance (e.g., publication) of the Catalogue

spatial.description: GeoProperty. Model:'http://purl.org/dc/terms/Location'. This property refers to a geographical area covered by the Catalogue

themeTaxonomy.description: Property. Model:'http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#ConceptScheme'. This property refers to a knowledge organization system used to classify the Catalogue's Datasets

modified.description: Property. Model:'http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#Literal'. This property contains the most recent date on which the Catalogue was modified

hasPart.description: Relationship. Model:'http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#Catalog'. This property refers to a related Catalogue that is part of the described Catalogue

items.description: Relationship. Every link to the related catalog

isPartOf.description: Relationship. Model:'http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#Catalog'. This property refers to a related Catalogue in which the described Catalogue is physically or logically included

record.description: Relationship. Model:'http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#CatalogRecord'. This property refers to a Catalogue Record that is part of the Catalogue

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

items.description: Relationship. Link to the catalog record

rights.description: Property. Model:'http://purl.org/dc/terms/RightsStatement'. This property refers to a statement that specifies rights associated with the Catalogue

catalog.description: Relationship. Model:'http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#Catalog'. This property refers to a catalog whose contents are of interest in the context of this catalog

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

items.description: Relationship. Every link to the contents of interest to the catalog

creator.description: Relationship. Model:'http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Agent'. The entities primarily responsible for producing the catalogue

items.description: Relationship. Model:'http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Agent'. The link to an entity primarily responsible for producing the catalogue
